boardgame.name: Concept
Concept Χωρίς λόγια
Koncept
Концепт
コンセプト
語破天機
boardgame.description: In Concept, your goal is to guess words through the association of icons. A team of two players _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; neighbors at the table _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; choose a word or phrase that the other players need to guess. Acting together, this team places pieces judiciously on the available icons on the game board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To get others to guess _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;milk_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, for example, the team might place the question mark icon (which signifies the main concept) on the liquid icon, then cubes of this color on the icons for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;food/drink_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;white_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. For a more complicated concept, such as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Leonardo DiCaprio_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, the team can use the main concept and its matching cubes to clue players into the hidden phrase being an actor or director, while then using sub-concept icons and their matching cubes to gives clues to particular movies in which DiCaprio starred, such as Titanic or Inception._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The first player to discover the word or phrase receives 2 victory points, the team receives points as well, and the player who ends up with the most points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Asmodee (ASMCONC01) A large, green animal from long ago? Must be a dinosaur. Water, cube and cold weather? Has to be an ice cube. A man with a job who rides large brown animals in the United States? Is that a cowboy? In Concept, players team up to place tokens on a board covered in icons, depicting everything from ancient samurai and snails to Leonardo DiCaprio. Points go to the player who can guess the correctly by looking at the various symbols, but in this wild party game, the points are less important than just having a great time!
